revised_title: A Comprehensive Analysis of Triggered Enzyme Systems in Blood Plasma
tldr: This article discusses the complexity and interrelations of various enzyme systems in blood plasma, including the blood clotting, fibrinolytic, renin-angiotensin, complement, and kinin forming systems. The author highlights the importance of understanding these systems in various pathologic processes and emphasizes the need for further research on genetic abnormalities in each system.
